verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> isn't <S%H1361><s%> haughty, nor my eyes <S%H5869><s%> lofty; <S%H7311><s%> nor do I concern <S%H1980><s%> myself with great matters, <S%H1419><s%> or things too wonderful for me. <S%H6381><s%>

Surely I have stilled <S%H7737><s%> and quieted <S%H1826><s%> my soul, <S%H5315><s%> like a weaned <S%H1580><s%> child with his mother, <S%H517><s%> like a weaned child <S%H1580><s%> is my soul within me. <S%H5315><s%>
Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hope <S%H3176><s%> in Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> from this time forth and <S%H5704><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>
